title: Juicy Brew
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The daily menu changes based farm produce. Offers a variety of breakfast and lunch sandwiches, side salads, chilled desserts, baked goods, coffee, tea, and cold pressed juice. Prepares veg items in a separate station. Free validated parking with entrance off of King or Young St.
